snippet: The Nusra Front, an affiliate of Al Qaeda, killed dozens of Syrian government soldiers who had been taken prisoner when a northern air base was captured this month.
abstract: Fighters with Al Qaeda affiliate Nursa Front execute at least 56 Syrian government soldiers captured during takeover of Abu Duhur Airbase in Syria's Idlib Province.
lead_paragraph: The Nusra Front, an affiliate of Al Qaeda, killed dozens of Syrian government soldiers who had been taken prisoner when a northern air base was captured this month.

headline.main: Islamic Militants Kill 56 Captive Syrian Soldiers
